pullrequest.title: Update REST plugin to display login username

content.raw:
I'm still a bit worried about this.  I was just looking at some tutorials which have screenshots of the icons on the right. A recent [pull request](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/252/update-screenshot-tutorial/diff) actually changed the screenshot to show the icon on the right. 

Do we really want to change the icon position because of a plugin? Would it be too difficult to push the icons to the left only when this plugin is being used? I can help with this. Maybe inserting the login label with a spacer in front of it?
content.html:
I'm still a bit worried about this. I was just looking at some tutorials which have screenshots of the icons on the right. A recent pull request actually changed the screenshot to show the icon on the right.

Do we really want to change the icon position because of a plugin? Would it be too difficult to push the icons to the left only when this plugin is being used? I can help with this. Maybe inserting the login label with a spacer in front of it?
